## Problem 1

1. Read and clean the Mr. Trash Wheel sheet
```{r, message = FALSE}
trashWheel_df <-
  read_excel("Trash-Wheel-Collection-Totals-8-6-19.xlsx") %>%
  janitor::clean_names() %>%
  select(-x15, -x16, -x17) %>%
  drop_na() %>%
  mutate(sports_balls = round(sports_balls))
```
